ANNOUNCEMENTS



The Berkeley Masjid Foundation


The Berkeley Masjid Foundation (BMF) is committed to maintaining a permanent place of worship, scholarly excellence, cultural outreach, and civic engagement for the Muslim community in Berkeley.

Thank you all for your support this far!


There are still outstanding constuction costs, interest free loans to repay and ongoing expenses now that we're open.

You can support the masjid with a tax deductible donation:

  • by electronic donation 
  • by pledging a donation
  • by mail
  • by interest-free loan (kardeh-hassan)

 

You can also support the project with your time, willingness to help, spreading the word about Berkeley Masjid, and above all your du'as.

 If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
